When you live in a welfare state, or, in this case, a welfare nation (England), this is what you get - the entitlements become expected, the desire to work does not exist as long as free money is doled out. This woman purposely gained the weight to become a burden to taxpayers. Her husband-to-be is just grabbing on to the free ride for a free ride!

Hillary's family was pretty well off and she inherited part of it, then she was a practicing attorney and partner in a law firm. She was also paid for speeches, appearances and some consulting when she was not holding office. She also earned money on her previously invested income. Her political position has certainly helped her earnings as it has with other politicians. Most members of congress are millionaires and many leave to go to work for the very industries they often encountered as members of congress. Hillary hasn't done anything illegal or unethical under current standards. That said, I would like to see all money removed from politics and all members of government forced to live like the average constituents in their districts. Maybe then they would pass legislation that addresses problems that we all deal with on a daily basis.
